title: IBAA Chatswood - Fo Guang Yuan
description: This is one of the Sydney metro branch Buddhist temples of the famous Nan Tien Temple in Wollongong. This serene and tidy place is tucked away near Westfield Chatswood's Spring Street entrance (where Coles & Aldi located). The restaurant boasts three levels, being vegetarian restaurant + Buddhist craft shop on the ground level, bookshop on the first level, and Buddhist temple / prayer hall on the second level. A selections of vegetarian hot foods are displayed on the bainmarie between 11:00am-03:00pm. A choice of 3 dishes with steamed rice $9.80. FREE unlimited hot tea (self serve).
